description: Review of J. Padgham 2012 A New Interpretation of the Cone on the Head in New Kingdom Tomb Scenes. Review of J. Padgham 2012 A New Interpretation of the Cone on the Head in New Kingdom Tomb Scenes. Eleanor B. Simmance. To reference this article we suggest: Simmance, E. B. 2013. ‘Review of J. Padgham. A New Interpretation of the Cone on the Head in New Kingdom Tomb Scenes. BAR International Series. Archaeopress: Oxford. 2012. Birmingham Egyptology Journa l 1: 19-21.
